Html:
Can I format exported data somehow? I exported for example columns "adress", "prize", "date" from my Lightswitch apliaction (VS 2012). All columns are exported as text format. Can I change format data as it is being exported or fix aplication format of fileds (string, decimal, date) ? I need to have number format in Excel because of making analysis, additional calculation etc.

Thank you

Radka

I do my exports to Excel via code in the server part

I use this library  http://epplus.codeplex.com/

It is not compatible with Silverlight, but sending a command to the server part of your application, you can have the server export this to a real excel file, and send the data back to the client.

For sending commands, you have to use the command table pattern

see:  http://blog.pragmaswitch.com/?p=332
